more.requirement: - Male or Female Vietnamese. - University degree or above in sales, marketing from Universities of Economics, Technical or relevant. - Minimum two years of experience in the same role in a quality organization (preferably 4 star or 5 star Hotel). - Exemplary planning and time management skills. - Excellent spoken and written English. - Computer literate (Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint). - Strong negotiation skills & able to handle guests well.
more.description:
1. In a clearly defined area of responsibility to personally maintain an agreed sales call pattern of a minimum (five) company visits and 10 (ten) telemarketing calls daily and achieve agreed weekly room night targets in line with the hotel's budgeted occupancy and average rate target, and to produce daily report relating to their visits and calls.
2. To undertake additional activities such as sales blitzes, telemarketing and direct mail campaigns, and fax / e-mail blitzes when demand requires it to be done.
3. To assist with the formulation of short/long term strategies aimed at achieving the results as outlined in the hotel's business plan.

5. To produce monthly report relating to specific areas of responsibility and the productivity of key accounts and prospective accounts they’re in.
6. To provide current, accurate, and appropriate up to date information on all key accounts and prospective accounts.
7. To follow through on any lead and ensure that the appropriate action is taken to secure business at every opportunity.
8. To ensure that all rate negotiations are carried out subject to actual/potential room night productivity of each client and that these rates are not outside the guidelines set down in the hotel's business plan.
9. Participate in the production of the monthly report by outlining account productivity, market segment performance breakdown, and month end performance vs. target, client/market feedback, and forthcoming monthly activities.
10. To be responsible for their designated accounts given to them and it will be maintained and monitored on a daily, weekly and monthly
